teaser.description: The teaser block is used to create a teaser for a content item. It can be used to link to any content item (target). By default, it uses the target's properties (title, description, preview image, etc.) but these can be overridden.

head_title.description: Custom kicker/head title shown above main title

preview_image.description: Custom preview image URL or path

theme.description: Background theme for the teaser block

slate.description: The text (slate) block is used to create text content. Its text content will be converted to Slate format automatically. DO NOT create nested blocks, only text is supported.

text.description: Plain text content that will be converted to Slate format

__button.description: The Button block is used to create a navigation button. It can be used to link to any URL or path.

title.description: The button text, it will be displayed on the button.

--block-alignment.description: Button alignment within the block's available width.

--block-width.description: Width avalable for the block on the page layout, narrow-width is the smallest (used by text blocks for readibility), and default-width is adequate for most blocks.

separator.description: The Separator block adds a horizontal line to separate content visually.

--block-alignment.description: Separator alignment within the block's available width. This option is disabled unless the separator block has shortLine set to true.

--block-width.description: Width available for the block on the page layout, narrow-width is the smallest (used by text blocks for readibility), and default-width is adequate for most blocks.

shortLine.description: If true, the separator will be a short line, otherwise it will be a full-width line within the block's available width.

image.description: The Image block is used to display an (internal or external) image  with title, description and alt text. It can also be linked to a URL or internal path. It can be aligned and size of the image can be adjusted.

alt.description: Alternative text for the image, used for accessibility

href.description: Link target (URL or internal path) when the image is clicked.

--block-width.description: Width available for the block on the page layout, narrow-width is the smallest (used by text blocks for readibility), default-width is adequate for most blocks, layout-width is the full width of the main content area, and 100% is the full width of the viewport. This setting is ONLY available when the align style is set to center.
